Articles.Content: Is there a pack that contains an mk1 sized crew cabin? So that i don't have to stack bulky MK1 Lander Cans without going S2?
You could also stack Mk1 inline cockpits, not an idea solution either. Sorry to say I don't know of any mods that have this.
Thanks, guess i'll see if a duplicate rescale of the S2 cabin doesn't look too weird.

The size seems a bit cheaty, but then again it only fits one crewmember, so i guess one just has to stack two to get room for two extra people.

Thanks!
